title: Improve your emails before you send them
description: AI tools can help you write more clearly and ensure your email is understood.
benefits: Improved evidence-based decision-making through structured, accurate summaries and clear identification of risks and gaps.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Summarise your completed research with Copilot free
description: Copilot free can summarise complex documents into clear points that save time and support faster decisions.
benefits: Improved evidence-based decision-making through structured, accurate summaries and clear identification of risks and gaps.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Keep records when you are using Copilot or other AI tools
description: AI can help NT Government staff quickly prepare compliant records for TRM by streamlining how prompts and outputs are captured.
benefits: Strengthened compliance with NT Government records and information management standards, ensuring transparency and accountability.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Use good AI prompts for text or image creation
description: Better AI outputs boost productivity by cutting the time people spend fixing or re‑asking for results.
benefits: Better outputs from AI will maximise the productivity benefits of using these tools and reduce people’s time and effort spent editing and re-querying AI.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Use Copilot with an Excel workbook to get insights from your data
description: Save time when analysing your Excel workbook by using AI to create clear, visual representations of your data.
benefits: This approach will save time when analysing data and can help produce clear visual representation of data.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Be transparent when you use AI
description: Increasing visibility of the NT Government’s ethical, professional use of AI to strengthen trust across departments and with clients.
benefits: Increases the visibility of NT Government’s ethical and professional use of AI, ensuring we maintain trust within our departments and with our clients.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Simplify your writing and convert documents to plain language
description: Copilot free can quickly rewrite complex text into clear, plain language, saving time and improving accessibility for diverse audiences.
benefits: Copilot free quickly rewrites complex text into clear, plain language, saving time and improving accessibility for diverse audiences.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Use Copilot free to quickly write meeting records
description: Using AI helps you write documents faster and keep track of actions more clearly.
benefits: Faster documentation and clearer action tracking.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Prevent Copilot and other AI from capturing information from confidential virtual meetings
description: Turning off AI protects confidential information and ensures compliance with NT Government obligations.
benefits: Protects confidential information and ensures compliance with NT Government obligations.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Draft an executive briefing note with support from AI
description: How AI can help you deliver faster turnaround times for briefing materials, more structured and consistent content for executive briefings, increased clarity for decision‑makers.
benefits: Faster turnaround times for briefing materials, more structured and consistent content for executive briefings, increased clarity for decision‑makers, and reduced workload for staff under time pressure.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Translate community engagement materials with AI assistance
description: AI translation tools can help draft multilingual content quickly, ensuring community messages reach diverse audiences while maintaining cultural sensitivity.
benefits: Faster multilingual content delivery, improved accessibility for multicultural communities, and reduced translation costs while maintaining quality through human review.
agency: Department of the Chief Minister and Cabinet

title: Generate accessible document formats using AI tools
description: Use AI to create alt text for images, improve document structure, and ensure compliance with accessibility standards for all NT Government publications.
benefits: Enhanced compliance with accessibility standards, reduced manual effort in creating alternative formats, and improved inclusivity for people with disabilities accessing government information.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Conduct preliminary risk assessments with AI support
description: AI can help identify potential risks, suggest mitigation strategies, and structure risk registers based on project information you provide.
benefits: Faster identification of potential risks, more comprehensive risk coverage through AI-assisted analysis, and standardized risk documentation across projects.
agency: Department of Infrastructure, Planning and Logistics

title: Create training materials and employee guides with AI
description: Transform complex procedures into clear training content, develop quiz questions, and structure learning materials efficiently using AI assistance.
benefits: Reduced time to develop training materials, consistent formatting and structure across resources, and improved learner engagement through AI-optimized content.
agency: Office of the Commissioner for Public Employment

title: Research legislative precedents and policy frameworks with AI
description: AI tools can help identify relevant legislation, summarize case law, and compare policy approaches across jurisdictions to support evidence-based policy development.
benefits: Faster research cycles, more comprehensive analysis of legislative frameworks, and improved quality of policy advice through broader evidence base.
agency: Department of the Attorney-General and Justice

title: Analyze stakeholder feedback and consultation responses with AI
description: Use AI to identify themes, categorize submissions, and extract key insights from large volumes of public consultation feedback quickly.
benefits: Faster analysis of community input, identification of emerging themes and concerns, and more responsive policy development based on stakeholder feedback.
agency: Department of the Chief Minister and Cabinet

title: Prepare performance reports and KPI summaries with AI assistance
description: AI can analyze performance data, generate narrative summaries, identify trends, and create visualization suggestions for quarterly and annual reports.
benefits: Streamlined reporting processes, consistent narrative quality across reports, and faster identification of performance trends requiring management attention.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development

title: Draft grant application responses and tender submissions using AI
description: AI helps structure responses to selection criteria, ensure consistent messaging, and optimize language to meet specific grant or tender requirements.
benefits: Higher quality submissions through structured responses, reduced preparation time for competitive applications, and improved consistency across multiple tender responses.
agency: Department of Treasury and Finance

title: Support budget forecasting and scenario planning with AI
description: Use AI to model different budget scenarios, identify cost drivers, and generate narrative explanations for budget variations and projections.
benefits: More robust scenario analysis, faster budget preparation cycles, and clearer communication of financial assumptions and risks to decision-makers.
agency: Department of Treasury and Finance

title: Streamline procurement documentation with AI writing assistance
description: AI can help draft statements of work, evaluation criteria, and tender specifications while ensuring compliance with procurement frameworks and policies.
benefits: Reduced time to market for procurement activities, improved consistency in tender documentation, and better alignment with procurement policy requirements.
agency: Department of Corporate and Digital Development
